name: One Bullet Demon
description:
It is always better to be sure that you are able to fully pay for your whim.
_____________________________________________________________________________________________

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

  • Rotate the space to reach a new level of mobility and flexibility in dealing with your victims;
  • Built-in timer: demons value their time;
  • Controls:
    - Mouse to aim;
    - Space to shoot;
    - R to call your bullet back;
    - F to switch fullscreen;
    - A and D to scroll the level to the left and to the right;
    - LMB;
